bibl.title: Alchemy, Hermetism and Gnosticism at Panopolis c. 300 A.D.: The Evidence of Zosimus.
Perspectives on Panopolis: An Egyptian Town from Alexander the Great to the Arab Conquest. Acts from an International Symposium Held in Leiden on 16, 17 and 18 December 1998

bibl.seg: 241 Panopolis 364 Chimica et Alchimica Gnostica Hermetica
MERTENS Michèle, Alchemy, Hermetism and Gnosticism at Panopolis c. 300 A.D.: The Evidence of Zosimus.

A. EGBERTS, B.P. MUHS and J. VAN DER VLIET (Edd.), Perspectives on Panopolis: An Egyptian Town from Alexander the Great to the Arab Conquest. Acts from an International Symposium Held in Leiden on 16, 17 and 18 December 1998 = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXXI (Leiden, 2002) pp. 165-175.
